mapper.select: select to_char(a.APPLY_DT,'yyyy/MM/dd') as CPL_DT, a.APPLY_DT, a.LAST_STAT_NAME, a.PROD_NAME, a.ZF_NBR_FLG, a.ACC_NUM, a.MKT_EMPLOYEE_ID, a.MAIN_OFFER_NAME, a.MAIN_OFFER_AMT, a.MAIN_PROM_ROW_ID, a.AGENT_POINT_ID, a.AGENT_POINT_NAME, a.STD_AREA_LVL5_NAME, a.SPEED, a.PRD_ITEM_TYPE, a.MIX_FLG, a.NEW_CCUST_FLG, a.MSU_211_CNT, a.MSU_MIX_HIGH_P21X_CNT, a.MSU_NEW_LAN_CNT, a.MSU_LAN_NEW_CCUST_CNT, a.MSU_NEW_CDMA_CNT, a.MSU_CDMA_NEW_CCUST_CNT, a.MSU_NEW_ITV_CNT, a.MSU_MIX_CNT, a.MSU_CDMA_MNP_Y_CNT, a.MSU_LT_CDMA_MNP_Y_CNT, a.MSU_YD_CDMA_MNP_Y_CNT, a.MSU_CDMA_MNP_N_CNT, a.MKT_ZJ_NAME, a.MSU_MIX_169_CNT, a.MKT_EMPLOYEE_NAME, a.SALES_EMPLOYEE_NAME, a.REAL_MSU_211_CNT from nbetl.RPT_REAL_PRD_LST_IO_DAY_D_sbj@"XFK.REGRESS.RDBMS.DEV.US.ORACLE.COM" a where a.APPLY_DT between #{start} and #{end} and a.IO_FLG='I' and a.std_area_lvl5_name like'%鄞州%'
